last_episode_to_air.name: Decisions
last_episode_to_air.overview: There's only one red moon left. Worried about Zenko, Koshiro, Kaga and Ayumi search for her. In desperation, Ayumi tells Zenko's mother the truth.

name: Switched
overview: High schooler Ayumi's perfect world evaporates when her envious classmate Zenko somehow steals her body, her boyfriend and her life.

episodes.name: Suicide
episodes.overview: Ayumi's crush asks her out, and she's overjoyed. But there's a red moon rising over town, and her classmate Zenko's scheme is almost complete.

episodes.name: Betrayal
episodes.overview: With Kaga's help and support, Ayumi realizes that Zenko planned the body-snatching. She demands to know how it's done, but Zenko claims to not know.

episodes.name: Confession
episodes.overview: Ayumi and Kaga visit Ukon, who tells them more about switching bodies. Kaga reveals his feelings for Ayumi, and Zenko is not happy about it.

episodes.name: Trap
episodes.overview: Ayumi and Kaga don’t believe Ukon when she tells them about Koshiro and Zenko’s plot. Ukon then has a talk with Zenko.

episodes.name: Lies
episodes.overview: Koshiro and Kaga reveal that they switched intentionally, and they have a plan for everyone to get their bodies back -- but they'll need Zenko's help.

episodes.name: Decisions
episodes.overview: There's only one red moon left. Worried about Zenko, Koshiro, Kaga and Ayumi search for her. In desperation, Ayumi tells Zenko's mother the truth.
